about_the_game:
"Unsheltered" is a realistic survival simulation game set in a secluded, forested area. As a player, you take on the role of a survivalist, using your wits and resources to endure and thrive. The game emphasizes resource management, crafting, trading, and skill-building, as you navigate the challenges of an unsheltered wilderness.

You'll need to gather materials for food, shelter, and tools, while also managing your water supply and maintaining your health in the face of dynamic weather conditions. Crafting is another key aspect of the game, allowing you to create weapons, tools, and equipment from the resources you gather.

Trading with the local village is necessary to acquire new resources and supplies, but you'll need to negotiate effectively to get what you need without giving up too much in return. You'll also need to build and maintain your skills in various aspects of survival, including hunting, fishing, farming, and construction.

Modern tools and equipment such as a pickup truck, solar panels, and communication devices can be incredibly useful in your quest for survival, but they also come with their own set of challenges. Maintaining your equipment requires careful attention, and gathering fuel for your truck is essential.

The constant threat of nuclear war adds a sense of urgency to your journey, as you work to prepare for the worst while also managing your day-to-day survival. With its detailed world-building, dynamic gameplay mechanics, and compelling storyline, "Unsheltered" is sure to immerse and challenge players who enjoy survival simulation games set in a post-apocalyptic world.
